statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-13 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 10 , -3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 6 , 5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + x + 2 , 30 \, x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} - 22 \, x + 36 , -3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
